reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a dress to have for just about any occasion. It’s not too tight and hugs you in all the right places. Absolutely beautiful and comfortable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy it!
reviews.reviewText: Amazing fit even for short gal. It hides the stomach very well. Split doesn't go up far so can be worn to work event. Also, really hugs the buttocks and enhances it. Great material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The dress slit is too far in the middle.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this thinking It would have a side slit like most dresses this length, but It is DEFINITELY in the middle of the dress. Even with dress tape I found It a bit difficult to keep this in place. It’s still a lovely dress, and of decent quality. It fit nicely and still had a bit of a stretch which made It more comfortable, and It isn’t see through, so that’s a plus! It’s a nice, breathable thickness, without any of the sheerness you’d typically see in stretchier dresses. I would say just be careful with the middle part, especially with standing and sitting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This dress is true to size. I got a large and it fits comfortably. The slit in the middle isn’t too high. Very cute black dress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a very cute dress and fits great. I could have went down a size but wasn't sure.A great dress for any occasion.the fabric feel very nice. I ordered 2 red dresses one shiny (which was used and mistreated) and this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So I love the dress but it is not big thigh/booty friendly. Not only did I have to make sure I watched my backside since the dress kept riding up, I also had to monitor my lady bits because the slit would expose all my goodies. Super cute and flattering just not body friendly for my curvy girls

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Cocktail Dress
reviews.reviewText: I am still losing the baby weight and am self-conscious of my stomach area. This dress is very flattering giving you a nice shape and the length is appropriate for wedding guest attire. I found the fit to be true to size. Great little black dress option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This dress is worth the money for sure. I plan on purchasing it in another color when I can find the right boots. I am 6ft tall and the slit is pretty high. The dress is made for about 5'8 or shorter in my opinion. If you are a girl who doesn't care about an almost revealing slit that is over 5'8 and a 34 or longer inseam then it's great. I will have to wear some sort of shorts underneath to feel more comfortable. For size reference I am 6ft, 35 inseam, 160lbs, 36A cup and I bought a medium and a large. The medium is a little snug in the chest but perfect everywhere else and the large was to big in general so I kept the medium. Buy it!
